property.name: Text
property.value: Draw 1 additional card at the beginning of the resource phase. Forced: After drawing cards at the beginning of the resource phase, choose and discard 1 of those cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After drawing your setup hand, instead of taking a mulligan, you may discard any number of cards from your hand. Then, draw that many cards. Action: If you have no cards in your hand, draw 6 cards. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: While the top card of your discard pile is an ally, Mithlond Sea-watcher gets +2 Û and gains ranged.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to play Skyward Volley, exhaust a ranged character you control. Combat Action: Deal 2 damage to an enemy engaged with a player. Resolve that effect again for each copy of Skyward Volley currently in your discard pile (you may choose different targets).

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Discard Grappling Hook and exhaust attached character to commit attached character to the quest, using its Û instead of its Ò (or instead of its Ú if the current quest has the siege keyword).

property.name: Text
property.value: While the top card of your discard pile is an attachment, Warden of the Havens gets +2 Ú and gains sentinel.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an enemy is declared as an attacker against you, declare an exhausted character you control as the defender. Resolve that effect again for each copy of Anchor Watch currently in your discard pile (all chosen characters are defending against this attack).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Ì or a Scout character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: At the beginning of the travel phase, exhaust Mariner's Compass and attached character to search the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a location. Switch that location with a location in the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Lindon Navigator does not exhaust to commit to a quest, and can commit to quests while exhausted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After resolving a quest to which Lindon Navigator was committed, either discard it from play or discard 1 card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Place 2 progress on any location. Resolve that effect again for each copy of The Evening Star currently in your discard pile (you may choose different targets).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a location in the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Progress from questing successfully may be placed on the attached location before it is placed on the current quest.

property.name: Text
property.value: While the top card of your discard pile is an event, Sailor of Lune gets +1 Ò and gains “Cannot be damaged while committed to the quest.”

property.name: Text
property.value: Quest Action: Ready a questing character and give that character +1 Ò until the end of the phase. Resolve that effect again for each copy of Elwing’s Flight currently in your discard pile (you may choose different targets).

card.name: To the Sea, to the Sea!

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust To the Sea, to the Sea! and discard X cards from your hand to reduce the cost of the next Noldor ally played this phase by X (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to Círdan the Shipwright or Gandalf. Attached character gains a Ì resource icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Narya and attached character to choose and ready up to 2 allies. Each of those allies gets +1 Û and +1 Ú until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Prepare the Corsair deck. Players prepare their fleet. Shuffle each stage 2 card in the quest deck so that their order is random, leaving stage 3 on the bottom. Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Rolling Seas and 1 copy of Scouting Ship, and add them to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sailing. While you are on-course (º), each Ship objective gets +2 Ò. When this stage is defeated, if you are on-course (º), look at the top 2 stages of the quest deck and advance to one of your choice, placing the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Otherwise, advance to the top stage of the quest deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Waterspout and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sailing. Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), each player must distribute 5 damage among characters he controls. When this stage is defeated, if you are on-course (º), look at the top 2 stages of the quest deck and advance to one of your choice, placing the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Otherwise, advance to the top stage of the quest deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Fog Bank and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sailing. While you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), each non-Ship ally gets –2 Ò. When this stage is defeated, if you are on-course (º), look at the top 2 stages of the quest deck and advance to one of your choice, placing the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Otherwise, advance to the top stage of the quest deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Scouting Ship and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sailing. While you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), each Ship enemy gains Boarding 1. When this stage is defeated, if you are on-course (º), look at the top 2 stages of the quest deck and advance to one of your choice, placing the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Otherwise, advance to the top stage of the quest deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Starlit Sea and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sailing. While you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), each Ocean location gets +1 $. When this stage is defeated, if you are on-course (º), look at the top 2 stages of the quest deck and advance to one of your choice, placing the other on the bottom of the quest deck. Otherwise, advance to the top stage of the quest deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Ship enemy with the highest $ and add it to the staging area (2 Ship enemies with the highest $ instead if there are 3 or more players in the game). Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sailing. You cannot place progress on Corsair Pursuit unless you are on-course (º). If there are no Ship enemies in play, you have defeated your pursuers, and win the game. If this stage has 10 or more progress on it, you have lost your pursuers, and win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scouting Ship gets –15 engagement cost while you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾).

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), Uncharted Ocean gains: “Travel: Raise each player’s threat by 3.”

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if you are off-course).

property.name: Text
property.value: While Fog Bank is the active location, Ship enemies do not make engagement checks, cannot attack, and cannot be attacked.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If your heading is at the worst setting (¾), attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Prepare the Uncharted deck. Set Shrine to Morgoth aside, out of play. Add 2 copies of Lost Island from the top of the Uncharted deck to the staging area (3 copies instead if there are 3 or 4 players in the game). The first player takes control of Calphon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Progress cannot be placed on Explore the Island except by quest effects. Forced: After a location is explored, add progress to Explore the Island equal to that location’s printed quest points. Forced: When an Uncharted location becomes the active location, add 1 copy of Lost Island from the top of the Uncharted deck to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add 2 copies of Lost Island from the top of the Uncharted deck to the staging area. Add Shrine to Morgoth to the staging area, Lost Island side faceup. Remove all progress from each Uncharted location in the staging area and shuffle them so that the players do not know which one is which.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After a location is explored, if it would be shuffled into the Uncharted deck, add it to the victory display, instead. The players cannot defeat this stage unless Shrine to Morgoth is in the victory display. When Shrine to Morgoth is added to the victory display, the players win the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Lost Island becomes the active location, flip it over. Action: Remove 4 progress from Lost Island to look at its facedown side.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: While Shrine to Morgoth is the active location, players cannot draw cards or search their decks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Shrine to Morgoth is flipped over while active, exhaust each ally in play with printed cost 2 or less. Then, each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Undead enemy and put it into play engaged with him. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: The first player gains control of Calphon.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Action: Exhaust Calphon to look at the bottom card of your deck. Then, you may switch that card with a card in your hand.
If Calphon leaves play, the players lose.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Servant of the Deceiver engages you, look at the top card of your deck. If it is printed cost 2 or less, place it on the bottom of your deck and Servant of the Deceiver gets +2 Û until the end of the round.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Lost Island becomes the active location, flip it over. Action: Remove 4 progress from Lost Island to look at its facedown side.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: While Lush Jungle is in the staging area, characters get –1 Û and lose ranged.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Lush Jungle is flipped over while active, return it to the staging area unless each player exhausts each ready hero he controls.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Lost Island becomes the active location, flip it over. Action: Remove 4 progress from Lost Island to look at its facedown side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Forbidden Coast is flipped over while active, each player may draw a card. Then, each player chooses a card from his hand and places it on the bottom of his deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Steep Plateau is explored, look at the facedown side of an Uncharted location in the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard the bottom card of the defending player’s deck. If that card’s printed cost is 2 or less, attacking enemy gets +2 Û.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either each player must exhaust a character he controls, or each Lost Island in the staging area gets +1 $ until the end of the phase.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard the bottom card of your deck. If that card's printed cost is 2 or less, exhaust a character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player discards the bottom card of his deck. Then, he discards each card in his hand with a printed cost higher than that of the discarded card.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard the bottom card of the defending player’s deck. If that card’s printed cost is 2 or less, attacking enemy gets +2 Û.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add 1 copy of Lost Island from the top of the Uncharted deck to the staging area. Remove all progress from each Uncharted location in the staging area and shuffle them so that the players do not know which one is which.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set Captain Sahír and Na’asiyah aside, out of play. Add The Havens Burn, Dream-chaser, and 1 copy of Sahír’s Ravager to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck and discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until X locations with the Aflame keyword are discarded, where X is the number of players in the game. Add each discarded Aflame location to the staging area. Then, shuffle the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the end of the combat phase, deal X damage to the Aflame location in play with the lowest Aflame value. X is the number of Corsair enemies in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Na’asiyah and Captain Sahír to the staging area, enemy side faceup. Each player reveals the top card of the encounter deck. Place resources on Na’asiyah and Captain Sahír equal to the amount of damage on The Dream-chaser. Add 1 resource to each other Raider enemy in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any time players would place progress on this quest, remove an equal amount of damage from locations in play instead. (Progress is placed on the active location before triggering this effect.) Each Raider enemy revealed by the encounter deck enters play with 1 resource on it. If Captain Sahír is in the victory display and each location in play has no damage, the players win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When a card is placed underneath The Havens Burn, reveal the top card of the encounter deck. If there are X or more cards underneath The Havens Burn, the Corsairs have destroyed the Elven fleet and the players lose the game. X is 3 more than the number of players in the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Aflame 12. Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: The players cannot travel to The Dream-chaser. When The Dream-chaser is placed underneath The Havens Burn, the players lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either deal 2 damage to an Aflame location in play, or search the encounter deck and discard pile for an Aflame location with the highest Aflame value, and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Sahír’s Ravager attacks, place 1 resource on it. Then, deal X damage to the Aflame location in play with the lowest Aflame value, where X is the number of resources on Sahír’s Ravager.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Mithlond Harbor is in the staging area, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each damage token on the active location.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Aflame 5. Burning Piers gets +1 $ for each damage on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Burning Piers is placed underneath The Havens Burn, deal 3 damage to The Dream‑chaser.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Add Burning Piers to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either deal 3 damage to Pillaged Ship, or add the topmost enemy in the encounter discard pile to the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Raider, move all resources from defending character to attacking enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Corsair enemy and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck. Forced: When White Ship is placed underneath The Havens Burn, place 1 resource on each Raider enemy in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Elven Wave-runner is added to the victory display, each player draws 1 card.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Raider, discard a card at random from your hand and place 1 resource on attacking enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: Each player must assign damage among characters he controls equal to the amount of damage on Elven Caravel. Forced: When Elven Caravel is placed underneath The Havens Burn, deal 1 damage to each character in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must either deal 3 damage to a character he controls, or to an Aflame location in play.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If the active location has the Aflame keyword, either deal it 3 damage or deal the defending character 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each Aflame location in play. If less than 3 total damage is dealt by this effect, The Fires Spread gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, deal 1 damage to each Aflame location in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Calm Waters is the active location, look at 2 additional cards from the top of the encounter deck during each Sailing test.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if attacking enemy is a Ship enemy).

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: Shift your heading off-course to travel here.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack deals damage to a Ship objective, shift your heading off-course.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either remove all progress from the current quest and raise each player’s threat by 4, or shift your heading off-course.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys a character, shift your heading off-course.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Rough Waters is in the staging area, cancel the first ¹ symbol found during each Sailing test.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If you are off-course (¼, ½, or ¾), attacking enemy gets +2 Û.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your heading is at the worst setting (¾), when faced with the option to travel, the players must travel to Waterspout, if able. Forced: After traveling to Waterspout, deal 4 damage to each Ship objective.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either shift your heading off-course or deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Excess damage from this attack is dealt to a Ship objective you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: If you are off-course, deal 1 damage to each character in play. If your heading is at the worst setting (¾), this effect cannot be canceled.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Either shift your heading off‑course or treat this attack as undefended.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Raider enemy revealed from the Corsair deck by Light Cruiser’s boarding keyword enters play with 1 resource on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Corsair Warship is in the staging area, it cannot be damaged and gains archery 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player reveals the top card of the Corsair deck and puts it into play, engaged with him.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if you control an exhausted Ship objective).

property.name: Text
property.value: While Southron Sailor is engaged with you, each Ship enemy engaged with you contributes its $ to the total $ in the staging area.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cunning Pirate gets +1 Û and +1 Ú for each resource on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Cunning Pirate engages you, discard an attachment you control and place resources on Cunning Pirate equal to that attachment’s printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: When Vicious Marauder engages you, discard a random card from your hand and place resources on it equal to that card’s printed cost.
Forced: When Vicious Marauder attacks you, distribute damage among characters you control equal to the number of resources on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are engaged with Umbar Captain, characters you control cannot attack Ship enemies.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Umbar Raider gets +1 Û for each resource on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Umbar Raider attacks you, move 1 resource from one of your heroes’ resource pools to Umbar Raider.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: When Corsair Infiltrator attacks, deal it 1 additional shadow card for each resource on it.
Forced: After the engaged player collects resources at the beginning of the resource phase, that player moves 1 resource from one of his heroes' pools to Corsair Infiltrator.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Raid Leader gets +1 Ú for each resource on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Raid Leader engages you, move 1 resource from each of your heroes’ resource pools to Raid Leader.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Place 1 resource on each Raider enemy in play. Each engaged non-Ship enemy makes an immediate attack. If there are no engaged non-Ship enemies, Battle-Hardened gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If the attacking enemy is a Raider, place 2 resources on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Drowned Dead attacks and destroys an ally, place that ally on the bottom of its owner's deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack destroys an ally, place that ally on the bottom of its owners's deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: While you are engaged with Soulless Cadaver, your deck cannot be searched.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Soulless Cadaver engages you, place each card in your hand with printed cost 2 or less on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Throngs of Unfaithful is destroyed, discard the bottom card of the engaged player’s deck. If that card’s printed cost is 2 or less, return Throngs of Unfaithful to the top of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each non‑objective ally with printed cost 2 or less. Place each ally destroyed by this effect on the bottom of its owner’s deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard the bottom card of your deck. If that card’s printed cost is 2 or less, attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Lost Island becomes the active location, flip it over. Action: Remove 4 progress from Lost Island to look at its facedown side.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Flooded Ruins is the active location, it contributes its $ to the staging area.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Lost Island becomes the active location, flip it over. Action: Remove 4 progress from Lost Island to look at its facedown side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Drowned Graves is flipped over while active, discard the top X cards of the encounter deck. Each player adds an Undead enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area. X is 2 more than the number of players in the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Uncharted. Cannot have player card attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Lost Island becomes the active location, flip it over. Action: Remove 4 progress from Lost Island to look at its facedown side.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Cursed Temple is the active location, characters with less than 2 Ò do not ready during the refresh phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The players, as a group, must remove characters with a total of at least X Ò from the quest. X is the number of Uncharted locations in the staging area. The first player may give Aimless Wandering doomed 2 to look at the facedown side of an Uncharted location in the staging area.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Captain Sahír engages the first player.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each point of damage Captain Sahír would take, discard 1 resource from him and cancel that damage. Forced: After Captain Sahír attacks, place 2 resource tokens on him (4 instead if his attack destroyed a character).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: The first player gains control of Captain Sahír.

property.name: Text
property.value: Captain Sahír gets +1 Ò and +1 Û for each resource on him (max +6). Action: Spend 1 resource from a hero you control to place 1 resource on Captain Sahír. (Limit once per round). If Captain Sahír leaves play, the players lose.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When Na’asiyah engages you, discard each event in your hand. Add 1 resource to Na’asiyah for each event discarded in this way. Forced: When Na’asiyah attacks or defends, she gets +1 Û and +1 Ú for this attack for each resource on her. After this attack, discard 1 resource from her.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: The last player gains control of Na’asiyah.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: While Na’asiyah is attacking or defending, spend 1 resource from her to give her +2 Û or +2 Ú for this attack. Action: Spend 1 resource from a hero you control to place 1 resource on Na’asiyah. (Limit once per round). If Na’asiyah leaves play, the players lose.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects. Sentinel.

property.name: Text
property.value:
The Dream-chaser can always be committed to Sailing tests (even if you are not the first player), and counts as 2 characters when committed to a Sailing test.
If the Dream-chaser is destroyed, the players lose the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects. Sentinel.

property.name: Text
property.value: Raise your starting threat by 3. Draw 1 additional card during the resource phase. If the Dawn Star is destroyed, its controller is eliminated from the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects. Sentinel.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Reduce the cost of the first ally you play each round by 1.
If Nárelenya is destroyed, its controller is eliminated from the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects. Sentinel. Ranged.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reduce your starting threat by 3. Each hero you control gets +1 Û. If the Silver Wing is destroyed, its controller is eliminated from the game.
